description: E60HN-16ELEC for Electrical and Electronic products,
full_summary:
### Tender Notice: Spectrum Analyzers and Electrical and Electronic Products

**Notice Title (English):** E60HN-16ELEC: Tender for Keysight Spectrum Analyzers and Electrical and Electronic Products
**Notice Title (French):** Arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement E60HN-16ELEC: Demande de soumission pour les analyseurs de spectre Keysight et les produits électriques et électroniques

**Reference Number:** cb-794-62718214
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-08 12:00:00
**Notice Date:** 2023-11-07

**Contracting Entity Name (English):** Canadian Special Operations Regiment
**Contracting Entity Name (French):** Régiment d'opérations spéciales canadien
**Contracting Entity Address:**
285 Brindle Road, Building CS-117, Petawawa, Ontario, K8H 2X3 Canada

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
**Evaluation Criteria:**

- Technical compliance to the requirement presented in this Notice and Annex A
- Technical compliance of equivalent (substitute) products offered
- Price comparison

**Annex A: Equipment List**

| **Part Number** | **Description** | **Quantity** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| N9917B-N9917B | 18 GHz FieldFox Microwave Analyzer | 5 |
| N9917B-N9917B-010 | Vector network analyzer time domain | 5 |
| ... | ... | ... |

**Submission Requirements:**

- Vendors are invited to submit a bid for all items listed in Annex A
- Equivalent products will be considered
- Technical compliance and price quotations must be included

**Evaluation and Selection Criteria:**

- Technical evaluation to ensure compliance with the requirement
- Price quotations to determine the lowest priced responsive bid

**Notice Dissemination:**

This notice was posted to the [Source/Date Not Provided] notice bulletin Board and other relevant electronic sources. 
Vendor Toolkit information is available at [Source/Date Not Provided]

**Contact Information:**

Dean Hiscock
Email: [dean.hiscock@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dean.hiscock@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 687-5511
Address: 285 Br
